content.rendered:
NASTP Jobs in Islamabad, 2024. In Islamabad, Pakistan, the National Aerospace Science and Technology Park (NASTP) is a renowned research and development organization. As a leader in aerospace research and development, NASTP is committed to excellence and innovation.

Within the NASTP, the Project Manager will coordinate and manage multiple projects. A candidate should have a strong background in project management and be able to effectively communicate and coordinate with cross-functional teams. The minimum monthly salary ranges from 14000 rupees to 35000 rupees.

You can advertise your jobs on Statesaga.com by contacting us

NASTP Jobs in Islamabad, 2024 Job Details

Date Posted: 08 Aug, 2024
Category: Government
Education: Degrees: Bachelor’s, Master’s, PhD, MCS, MIT, B.E., MS, BS
Location: Islamabad, Pakistan
Organization: NASTP is the National Aerospace Science and Technology Park
Job Type: Full-time
Last Date: 16 October 2024

Latest Job In August 2024

  • Islamabad Exim Bank Job in 2024
  • Job at Peshawar Services Club in August 2024
  • Job At Balochistan Wheels Limited In Karachi In August 2024

The National Aerospace Science and Technology Park (NASTP) is inviting applications for positions and openings advertised in Islamabad, Rawalpindi, Pakistan, as previously reported in the Nawaiwaqt newspaper on August 8th, 2024.

The preferred types of education include Master’s, Bachelor’s, MCS, MIT, B.E, Ph.D., and MS. Government management jobs are available at the National Aerospace Science and Technology Park NASTP, including those advertised in newspapers, which will close on October 16, 2024. In the National Aerospace Science and Technology Park (NASTP), NASTP is looking for candidates to fill the latest job openings.

The article discusses career opportunities at the National Aerospace Science and Technology Park (NASTP) in Islamabad, Pakistan. You can learn about the benefits of working for this prestigious institution and how to apply.

Conclusion

In conclusion, working at NASTP offers a rewarding and fulfilling career path for management professionals passionate about aerospace science and technology. By joining NASTP, employees become part of a dynamic team dedicated to pushing the boundaries of aerospace research and innovation. This shapes the future of Pakistan’s aerospace industry.
